meanings.definition: The state or quality of being oily.
meanings.sent1: The oilinesses of the salad dressing made it too greasy.
meanings.sent2: I wiped away the oilinesses from the kitchen counter with a paper towel.
meanings.sent3: The oilinesses of the pizza slice left a shiny trail on the plate.
meanings.sent4: The oilinesses of the situation made it slippery and hard to handle.
meanings.sent5: The oilinesses of the mechanic's hands showed he had been hard at work.

meanings.definition: The characteristic of having an oily texture or appearance.
meanings.sent1: The oilinesses of the car engine indicated it needed maintenance.
meanings.sent2: Her hair had a natural oilinesses that made it shiny and smooth.
meanings.sent3: The oilinesses of the soap bar made it slip out of my hands.
meanings.sent4: The oilinesses of the lake's surface reflected the sunlight beautifully.
meanings.sent5: The oilinesses of the frying pan helped cook the eggs without sticking.
